name: Fodder Cannon
description:
My submission to the GM48 10 Game Jam.

Hey!

Hey you!

Yeah, you. See that guy on the other side of the screen? Go kick his butt.
Why you say? Why not?

But... why do it yourself when you have the latest to minion-projecting technology? And with so many eager minions just itching to kick something, you don't need to get your hands, er, feet dirty!
